website_summaries.verdict: This compact multi-tool is a great introduction to the Spyderco family of knives. It has an appealing entry-level price and solid construction.
pros: Fits well in a pocket, emergency toolkit, or glove compartment
All-metal construction, including blade, bottle opener, and screwdriver
cons: Blade may arrive in dull condition
Heavier and bulkier than expected for a compact multi-tool

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for a great little knife!
customer_reviews.text: Spyderco makes this Clipitool in 3 different styles, one with scissors, one with a serrated-edge blade, and this one with a screwdriver/bottle opener. I wanted this little knife for my husband because of the screwdriver attachment. He loves knives, particularly Spyderco, so this made a great little gift for him. The knife is small and easy to carry. Plus, the price on Amazon, with free shipping even, is great! On the Spyderco website where I usually buy knives for him, this cost $39.95 plus shipping! Great deal on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite. The knife is perfectly sized - small enough ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a variety of knives and multiools on keychains for the last 20 years. This is my favorite. The knife is perfectly sized - small enough to hang from a keychain while large enough to be useful. The bottle opener and flat head work great. And, it has Spyderco quality, which is top notch in the price range. I use mini caribiners on my keyring to hook this on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small, useful.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for emergencies in my car. So far it's come in handy for opening boxes and cutting tape, etc. It's sharp, and hopefully will stay that. It's little enough to tuck away somewhere and forget about until you need it.
customer_reviews.author: H A

customer_reviews.title: a great little pocket knife
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Spyderco ClipiTool (I lost my previous one). I love that this knife is small enough to comfortably fit in the pocket of my jeans or whatever pants or shorts I am wearing, and the blade, though shorter than many pocket knives, is sharp and capable of handling 90% of my needs. I love craft beer and therefore I use the bottle opener often, and the screwdriver end of the bottle opener is super helpful. This knife if everything I need and nothing that I dont need. And it looks nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Everything made by spiderco is awesome this knife/tool is very small and can be put anywhere you don’t notice it in your pocket really good quality and the tools work
customer_reviews.author: Brent couturiaux

customer_reviews.title: The perfect everyday carry knife
customer_reviews.text: This knife is lightweight, high quality, well priced and is able to open the two things that need to be opened on a daily basis; boxes and beer.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan McBailey

customer_reviews.title: no scissors :(
customer_reviews.text: picts do not match the product - it's small but bulky - was hoping it wouldn't be so thick - doesn't rest well on my pockets edge... so I'm using it at a letter opener - really would have been cool if it came with scissors like the pict.
customer_reviews.author: stuff n things

customer_reviews.title: ... size of this pocket knife is by far its greatest feature. I carry this with me everyday and ...
customer_reviews.text: The size of this pocket knife is by far its greatest feature. I carry this with me everyday and the size is perfect to keep in your front pocket. I have carried other larger sized pocket knifes in the past and looked for something smaller. This was the answer. As with any Spyderco knife, the blade itself is extremely high quality. The only draw back of this knife is the flathead screw driver. I have tried to use it for several things, but can never seem to use it very effectively at all. If you're looking for a small, high quality everyday carry knife, this is a fantastic option.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Pierce

customer_reviews.title: This is a solid knife at a great price. The slightly brushed stainless steel is very ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid knife at a great price. The slightly brushed stainless steel is very aesthetically pleasing and holds up well against scratches while its in your pocket. Both the knife and the bottle opener/screwdriver utilize a friction lock which means you'll have to use two hands to open it, but that hasn't been a problem so far and the lock does a great job keeping the tools locked in place while you're using them. The screwdriver is a flat head and its pretty narrow a so it will probably be reserved for smaller screws but its sturdy none the less. And of course its incredibly sharp even before sharpening it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Diberardino

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little pocket knife
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy. Super sharp, great blade - exactly what you’d expect from the brand. A bit larger than a pocket knife but much more effective. Bought one for myself and two others as gifts. Recipients were also very happy. Very good quality, looks great, heavy for its size (in a good way). The perfect little pocket knife.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality knife
customer_reviews.text: Top of the line quality knives. Same as Victorinox, you can expect the knife to be perfect. Razor sharp as well.
customer_reviews.author: jbl

customer_reviews.title: The biggest disappointment was the blade was dull when I received it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an EDC backup. I expected more based on the reviews and the manufacturers reputation. The knife is difficult to open, (both the blade and the opener) although I hope it will loosen up a little over time. The biggest disappointment was the blade was dull when I received it. Spyderco has a reputation of shipping really sharp blades and this one really missed the mark.
customer_reviews.author: FDS

customer_reviews.title: Good knife for keeping in pocket
customer_reviews.text: Nice little knife, real sharp out of the box. Love spyderco knives and I own a nice collection. Just happy it's authentic since the last one I ordered from Amazon had not spyderco branding on it whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: CD343

customer_reviews.title: Great knife.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little pocket knife. Just be sure to take the clip off.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: keychain cutter
customer_reviews.text: Sharp and convenient knife. Excellent on a keychain - just put keyring through the bottle opener hole.
customer_reviews.author: Running Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great size, dulls somewhat quickly
customer_reviews.text: It's extremely sharp upon arrival, but because the metal is so thin (razor sharp) the blade dulls quickly. But it works perfectly for me with all the boxes I constantly have to open at work. It also fits in my pocket on my keychain pretty darn well.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin L. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to add to my EDC. Small, light, and sharp. The bottle opener comes in handy often. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor DeSoto

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that would make this better would have been a locking blade.
customer_reviews.author: Casey A. Lasalle Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great pocket knife
customer_reviews.text: Great little EDC pocket knife. Very sharp. Small enough to fit inside that small jean pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Super small, super sharp
customer_reviews.text: Super small but it is sharp and fits perfect for edc.
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: An itty-bitty-beauty
customer_reviews.text: Small but extremely useful as an everyday carry item. Super easy to open because of the little hole in the blade, this think is built like a tank.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dinkins

customer_reviews.title: its his first spyderco and his favorite knife.
customer_reviews.text: got it for my dad who loves small slips. its his first spyderco and his favorite knife.
customer_reviews.author: Victor L. Plotkin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A good small knife, but it has scissors like in photos !!!
customer_reviews.author: N.K.

customer_reviews.title: Spyderco sells a perfect keychain knife sans bottle opener
customer_reviews.text: Probably necessary to be so big to have both a knife and a usable bottle opener, but this guy is too big for my keychain. Spyderco sells a perfect keychain knife sans bottle opener. It's ok, I'll toss this guy in the car
customer_reviews.author: Hendo

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Knife
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these to keep in my pocket during the summer months. So far I'm impressed. Comes very sharp out of the box, opens bottles flawlessly, and I've already repaired a busted door knob with the screw driver.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick T.

customer_reviews.title: The blade is the best thing about this tool.
customer_reviews.text: The blade came very sharp. The bottle opener is works ok, but could would better if it could remove a bottle cap with only one stroke. The screwdriver tip is handy feature.
customer_reviews.author: Earl J. Depass

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant! The perfect small knife for low-key needs with ...
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant! The perfect small knife for low-key needs with the vital ability to open a bottle. Have it in my pocket most any time I'm not in the office.
customer_reviews.author: John Green

customer_reviews.title: I recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.text: Quality product that has fulfilled my expectations. I recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great small pocket knife. It holds a good edge and performs like it should.
customer_reviews.author: T Mc

customer_reviews.title: Great size and functionality.
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this knife, I'm not sure that you will find something of this size with better craftsmanship and usefulness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pop goes the weasel
customer_reviews.text: great little pocket knife with bottle opener.The quality appears to be good on this little knife and expect it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect knife for everyday carry. Elegant, sharp, and a bottle opener/screw driver is a perfect addition!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Great for shotgunning beers
customer_reviews.text: One of the best $20 purchases I've made in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Awesome edition for a micro EDC. Totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Al Amode

customer_reviews.title: Very small knife. Blade came sharp out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very small knife. Blade came sharp out of the box. No lock on it. There is room for your finger to rest so you don't accidentally chop your fingers off while using it in case it closes.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, great edge
customer_reviews.text: Simple, compact, sturdy, great edge. Would highly recommend for a compact multi-tool for Everyday Joe. It's not a handyman's screwdriver replacement but is a good back-up.
customer_reviews.author: Pool Hall ACE

customer_reviews.title: Boom
customer_reviews.text: sharp blade. superior quality and very sturdy. Bottle opener works great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Francis

customer_reviews.title: Sharp out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Sharp as a razor right out of the box. Very solid feel. It is rather small so bear that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: David A Weitgenant

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The knife was perfect. Just what I was looking for to add to my EDC.
customer_reviews.author: KortlandMcManus

customer_reviews.title: and performed better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: It was compact , built well , and performed better than I expected .
customer_reviews.author: Orlando H.

customer_reviews.title: Very cool little knife
customer_reviews.text: Very cool little knife. I thought it was interesting looking so I bought it. Now that I have it I'm trying to think when I would carry it. I guess in the summer, I would have it in a pair of shorts rather than a big bulky knife. I don't go anywhere without a knife in my pocket. Extremely handy to have. I do like the little fella though. Pretty cool
customer_reviews.author: Chupacabra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad that I purchased this. I attach it to my pant pocket every time that I leave the house. It's small enough to go unnoticed but works perfectly when I need to open a bottle top or cut something. Perfect for my urban lifestyle. Since it's a Spyderco, the quality is top notch and I expect to have this a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good knife
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a small work knife...use the screwdriver more than I thought I would
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my edc
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a pry bar/bottle opener multi tool when I stumbled across this little gem. Perfect size and complimentary tools to keep along side my other edc. The knife is an added bonus and is razor sharp, I use exclusively for food where as my pocket knife can be used for everything else. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Monduxe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little knife that's very useful. It could stand to be a little bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mayberry

customer_reviews.title: Small but big on awesomeness!
customer_reviews.text: Great little knife, Spyderco always made well. Cool little bottle opener too
customer_reviews.author: MoSsMaN

product_meta.title: Spyderco ClipiTool Multi-Functional Stainless Steel Pocketknife with 2" Steel Blade and Screwdriver/Bottle Opener - PlainEdge - C175P
product_meta.description: Style:Screwdriver/OpenerClipiTools are a special variety of tool that combine a high-performance cutting edge with the added convenience and functionality of other tools like scissors, a serrated blade, or a bottle opener/screwdriver. A fresh, new approach to the multi-purpose pocketknife, ClipiTools are sure to set a new standard in utilitarian convenience. C175P ClipiTool Bottle Opener & Screwdriver Features a non-locking primary blade and a combination bottle opener/flat-blade screwdriver.
feature_bullets: CLIPITOOL - A special family of tools that combine a high-performance cutting edge with the added convenience and functionality of other tools. They feature pocket clips for convenient carry and easy access.
MULTIFUNCTIONAL - Features a convenient folding bottle opener that also doubles as a flat-blade screwdriver
PLAINEDGE BLADE - This knife has a sharpened blade with no serrations or teeth sometimes referred to as a smooth blade.
SLIP JOINT - A non-locking mechanism in which the blade is held open by spring pressure on a flat section on the back of the blades tang.
SPECIFICATION - Closed Length (Inches): 2.57, Overall Length (Inches): 4.59, Blade Length (Inches):2.02, Blade Steel: 8Cr13MoV, Grind: Full-Flat

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars105 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
